name: 健康管理
restrict: ◎第一階段限 運動傷害防護學程 ◎課程開放上修
goals: To understand the meaning of health and health management
To understand health-beneficial effects of taking part in physical activity and regular exercise
To understand how to apply exercise related knowledge in the daily life
To understand exercise and health management related topics of different populations
syllabus:
Week 1 (2/15) Introduction 

Week 2 (2/22) Energy (im)balance and health 

Week 3 (3/1) Energy (im)balance and health 

Week 4 (3/8) Healthcare management for athlete 

Week 5 (3/15) Addictive behaviour and (un)healthy management

Week 6 (3/22) Ageing and healthy ageing 

Week 7 (3/29) Obesity prevention 

**_Week 8 (4/5) A day off_** 

Week 9 (4/12) Chronic diseases (e.g., cardiovascular diseases) prevention 

Week 10 (4/19) Midterm examination (20%)

Week 11 (4/26) Promotion of regular execise 

Week 12 (5/3) Female health management

Week 13 (5/10) Mental health management

Week 14 (5/17) Presentation (Case study)

Week 15 (5/24) Presentation (Case study)

Week 16 (5/31) Presentation (Case study)

Week 17 (6/17) Self-directed learning 

Week 18 (6/24) Self-directed learning
prerequisite: ◎First phase Exclusive for students within The Program of Injury Prevention and Athletic Training ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
